column4: can someone with good all around knowledge about ubuntu pm me please
well i want to know if i switch to ubuntu will it mess with any of my current files and what not..
and i make the complete switch how will it be working?
i just dont want it to interfere with my music files..
i want ubuntu to be my default os though.
i have barely any hdd space..
and i want it to work as if it were my windows xp.
so are you trying to install instead of XP, but keep the files?
the music by itself is over 100gigs
ubuntu cant work like an upgrade cd to XP
i could care less about the rest
